page.title: 09Collecting Postage Stamps
page.content: I started to{collect stamps}when I was eight.(I am now 11). It all began when I saw some old stamps in a shop window. My mother bought them for me because I would not be quiet about them and it was the only way she could get some peace! After that I bought myself some{first day covers}with my holiday spending money instead of buying ice creams. I wanted the stamps more than the ice creams! Postage stamps come in all{shapes and{sizes}and in many{colours.}They have all sorts of interesting{pictures on them including wild life, natural scenery and famous people and events. You can learn a lot from just looking at stamps!. Many people collect stamps because they are{cheap to buy.}I mount my stamps in{albums}to keep them safe and keep my{swops}in a plastic bag. TECLA
